articles.description: People say situation in territory has worsened since outbreak of hostilities between Israel and Iran last week
articles.content:

articles.title: 4 dead after old bridge collapses in Pune amid heavy rain, several still missing
articles.description: Pune bridge collapse: Four people were killed and 32 others were injured when a dillapidated bridge collapsed and fell into the Indrayani river amid heavy rain. Rescue operation was underway as several others are still missing.
articles.content: Four people were killed and 32 others were injured after an old bridge collapsed in Pune amid heavy rain on Sunday afternoon, Maharashtra Chief Minister Devendra Fadnavis said. The bridge collapsed and fell into the Indrayani river and swept away at ... [3955 chars]

articles.description: AB de Villiers revealed Virat Kohli stopped speaking to him after he leaked the news of Kohli's second child. Kohli later reached out during a challenging career phase, showing their strong bond despite the incident.
